sqlQuery.name: terms
sqlQuery.sql: WITH RECURSIVE Parents(child, parentlist) AS ( SELECT display_value , ARRAY[]::TEXT[] FROM NIAGADS.DataDictionaryTerms WHERE parent_term IS NULL UNION SELECT rel.display_value, CASE WHEN rel.parent_term = 'extract' THEN 'material type' WHEN rel.parent_term = 'platform' THEN 'platform type' WHEN rel.parent_term = 'life cycle stage' THEN 'life stage' WHEN rel.parent_term = 'software pipeline' THEN 'pipeline' ELSE rel.parent_term END || parents.parentlist FROM NIAGADS.DataDictionaryTerms rel JOIN parents ON rel.parent_term = parents.child ), Categories AS ( SELECT child AS term, CASE WHEN array_length(parentlist, 1) = 1 THEN parentlist[1] WHEN array_length(parentlist, 1) = 2 THEN parentlist[2] ELSE parentlist[3] END AS annotation_type, CASE WHEN array_length(parentlist, 1) = 2 THEN parentlist[1] ELSE parentlist [2] END AS annotation_subtype, CASE WHEN 'biosample type' = ANY(parentlist) AND array_length(parentlist, 1) = 3 THEN parentlist[1] ELSE NULL END AS biosample_type FROM Parents) SELECT 'NDD' AS ontology, c.annotation_type, c.annotation_subtype, c.biosample_type, d.display_value AS term, d.source_id, CASE WHEN source_id LIKE 'ERO%' OR source_id LIKE 'NO%' THEN NULL WHEN uri IS NULL THEN jsonb_build_object('url', 'http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/' || source_id, 'value', 'http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/' || source_id, 'tooltip', 'Explore mapped term ' || display_value || ' in its original ontology', 'type', 'link') ELSE jsonb_build_object('url', uri, 'value', uri, 'tooltip', 'Explore mapped term ' || display_value || ' in its original ontology', 'type', 'link') END AS term_link, d.synonyms, d.definition FROM NIAGADS.DataDictionaryTerms d, Categories c WHERE c.term = d.display_value
